name: 9 to 5 (ayyem)
description:
You'll Need Quick Wits To Climb This Corporate Ladder Credits Developers
  • Shaid Rojani
  • Azim Momin
Music
  • Xdeviruchi - 8-Bit Fantasy & Adventure Pack
Art
  • Clint Bellanger (OpenGameArt) - Fantasy Class Icons
  • PNGItme - Card Background Image
  • IBM Digital Design System Team - People Icons
  • AmySaurus121 (DeviantArt) - Title Background Art
  • Noirlac - Battle Background Art
  • Designbeep - Office Icons
  • Dansevenstar - Life Icon
  • PNGTree - Dollar Vector Art
Instructions
  • Build your deck by opening the Deck Building menu and dragging cards between your reserves and main deck.
  • Click on coworker’s icons to talk with them and initiate battle.
  • Drag your skills onto the enemy you want to target
    • There are 6 attack types
      • Attack - Damages enemy by specified amount.
      • Defense - Protects against enemy attacks. Resets on your next turn.
      • Buff/Debuff Attack - Modifies all subsequent attack cards played. Resets on your next turn.
      • Buff/Debuff Defense - Modifies all subsequent defense cards played. Resets on your next turn.
    • Defense cards also need to be dragged onto an enemy even though they boost your defense.
